FSM Flow Chart
[OCG Finite State Machine (FSM)]

This flow chart shows how the FSM works. More...

Collaboration diagram for FSM Flow Chart:
This flow chart shows how the FSM works.

There are the following steps the OCG module should contain :

  • start OCG
  • get option
  • detect file
  • initiate an emulation
  • parse filename
  • create directory
  • parse XML
  • save XML
  • call OAI emulator
  • generate report
  • end OCG

The following diagram is based on graphviz (http://www.graphviz.org/), you need to install the package to view the diagram.
